0.text: Innate: Whenever Jinx scores a  takedown against an enemy  champion, epic  monster,  turret, or inhibitor within 3 seconds of damaging them, she gains  175% bonus movement speed which decays over 6 seconds.

1.text: Additionally, she gains  25% total attack speed and is allowed to exceed the attack speed cap for the same duration.

metaData.2: COST: 20 MANA PER ATTACK WITH  FISHBONES

0.text: Toggle: Jinx switches between  Pow-Pow, her minigun, and  Fishbones, her rocket launcher.

1.text: Pow-Pow: Basic attacks with Pow-Pow generate a stack of  Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow. Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with the first stack being twice as potent. Stacks expire one at a time.

2.text: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the primary target as well as surrounding enemies. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers. While using Fishbones,  Jinx gains  bonus range but loses  10% of her bonus attack speed.

3.text: Only the first attack after switching to Fishbones will benefit from Rev'd up.

metaData.3: CAST TIME: 0.6 − 0.4 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Jinx fires a shock blast in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it hits and  reveals and  slows them for 2 seconds.

Active: Jinx tosses out 3 Chompers at the target location that land in a perpendicular line after 0.4 seconds, arming after 0.5 seconds, and exploding after 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to all enemies within a small area.

1.text: Each Chomper explodes on contact with an enemy  champion,  knocking them down and  rooting them for 1.5 seconds. Enemy champions can only be affected by one Chomper.

2.text: Flame Chompers! will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Jinx fires a rocket in the target direction, granting brief  sight of the area it flies through. The rocket explodes upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing physical damage to them and all enemies in an area around them and granting  sight of the area around them for 2 seconds.

1.text: The rocket deals 10% − 100% (based on distance traveled) damage; the bonus damage based on missing health is kept the same.

0.content: 250 / 400 / 550 (+ 150% bonus AD) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of target's missing health)

1.content: 25 / 40 / 55 (+ 15% bonus AD) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of target's missing health)

2.text: Enemies surrounding the main target take 80% damage. Bonus damage based on missing health is based on each unit's own missing health, with a maximum bonus damage of 800 against  monsters.

0.content: 200 / 320 / 440 (+ 120% bonus AD) (+ 20 / 24 / 28% of target's missing health)

1.content: 20 / 32 / 44 (+ 12% bonus AD) (+ 20 / 24 / 28% of target's missing health)

abilities.concerningText: Pow-Pow: Basic attacks with Pow-Pow generate a stack of  Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow. Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with the first stack being twice as potent. Stacks expire one at a time.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Energized: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.
Unique – Sharpshooter: When fully Energized, your next basic attack deals 120 bonus magic damage on-hit. Energized attacks gain 35% bonus range, capped at 150.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ENERGIZED: Moving and basic attacking generates Energize stacks, up to 100.

origin: 250 / 400 / 550 (+ 150% bonus ad) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of target's missing health)
st_flatStats0.concerningText: The rocket deals 10% − 100% (based on distance traveled) damage; the bonus damage based on missing health is kept the same.

origin: 200 / 320 / 440 (+ 120% bonus ad) (+ 20 / 24 / 28% of target's missing health)
st_flatStats0.concerningText: Enemies surrounding the main target take 80% damage. Bonus damage based on missing health is based on each unit's own missing health, with a maximum bonus damage of 800 against  monsters.

Pow-Pow: Basic attacks with Pow-Pow generate a stack of  Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow. Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with the first stack being twice as potent. Stacks expire one at a time.

2.origin: COST: 20 MANA PER ATTACK WITH  FISHBONES

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the primary target as well as surrounding enemies. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers. While using Fishbones,  Jinx gains  bonus range but loses  10% of her bonus attack speed.
